rows.label: tlk4440008901_msg0001
rows.name:
I released a companion volume to help
sell my original book about flowers.
What do you think it was about?

rows.label: tlk4440008901_msg0002
rows.name:
No, not dashing gentlemen, actually.
I wrote a story about beautiful ladies
based on all the different flowers!

rows.label: tlk4440008901_msg0003
rows.name:
It was a huge hit with male readers.
We just can't publish enough copies
to meet demand!

rows.label: tlk4440008901_msg0004
rows.name:
And that managed to put me up there
as a bestselling author!

rows.label: tlk4440008901_msg0051
rows.name:
I bet you thought tales of charming
young men would never sell, didn't
you?

rows.label: tlk4440008901_msg0052
rows.name:
The female reader base just can't
get enough of the heated drama!

rows.label: tlk4440008901_msg0053
rows.name:
I don't imagine I'd have been able to
make it if it weren't for you. I greatly
appreciate all your support!
